name: Function.ofArity_zero
initialProofState:
α β : Type u
⊢ Eq (Function.OfArity α β 0) β
decl:
@[simp]
theorem ofArity_zero (α β : Type u) : OfArity α β 0 = β := fromTypes_zero _ _

name: Function.ofArity_succ
initialProofState:
α β : Type u
n : Nat
⊢ Eq (Function.OfArity α β n.succ) (α → Function.OfArity α β n)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem ofArity_succ (α β : Type u) (n : ℕ) :
    OfArity α β n.succ = (α → OfArity α β n) := fromTypes_succ _ _

name: Function.OfArity.const_zero
initialProofState:
α β : Type u
b : β
⊢ Eq (Function.OfArity.const α b 0) b
decl:
@[simp]
theorem const_zero (α : Type u) {β : Type u} (b : β) : const α b 0 = b :=
  FromTypes.const_zero (fun _ => α) b

name: Function.OfArity.const_succ
initialProofState:
α β : Type u
b : β
n : Nat
⊢ Eq (Function.OfArity.const α b n.succ) fun x => Function.OfArity.const α b n
decl:
@[simp]
theorem const_succ (α : Type u) {β : Type u} (b : β) (n : ℕ) :
    const α b n.succ = fun _ => const _ b n :=
  FromTypes.const_succ (fun _ => α) b

name: Function.OfArity.const_succ_apply
initialProofState:
α β : Type u
b : β
n : Nat
x : α
⊢ Eq (Function.OfArity.const α b n.succ x) (Function.OfArity.const α b n)
decl:
theorem const_succ_apply (α : Type u) {β : Type u} (b : β) (n : ℕ) (x : α) :
    const α b n.succ x = const _ b n := FromTypes.const_succ_apply _ b x

name: Function.FromTypes.fromTypes_fin_const
initialProofState:
α β : Type u
n : Nat
⊢ Eq (Function.FromTypes (fun x => α) β) (Function.OfArity α β n)
decl:
lemma fromTypes_fin_const (α β : Type u) (n : ℕ) :
    FromTypes (fun (_ : Fin n) => α) β = OfArity α β n := rfl
